1.content:
After he leaves you take a look at your new remote It is slightly longer then a normal remote or a cable box remote & the buttons at the bottom of it are

Enter C, Enter, Random, Exit C, Exit, B.S, C.S, V.S

which most of them don’t make sense to you but you don’t really care.

Later that night as your watching tv you hit one the buttons but which one...
1.title: The Remote

choices: Make a character from the TV show enter your universe.
Make you enter the TV show's universe from a character's house.
Allow you to type something in (i.e. "character" meaning "letter/number/symbol")
Allow you to make an OC and introduce that OC into the actual show.
11.content:
You pressed the button marked "enter character".

To clarify, for the second option, it's not a swap: you're still you, and the character still lives there. The character also doesn't go anywhere.

What does the button do?
11.title: Enter Character

choices: The original character breaks the 4th wall.
114.content:
The button itself allows you to make an original character and introduce your original character into the actual show itself.

You start making your original character in other words an animated anthropomorphic saber tooth tiger that's about to be introduced into the actual show.

Now what will happen next?
114.title: Allow you to make an OC and introduce that OC i...

choices: They just kept on reenacting the episode as though he wasn't there.
They noticed Sam and were scared.
They noticed Sam and were curious.
They noticed Sam, but thought it was normal to have a talking prehistoric cat.
1141.content:
You sent your sabre-toothed tiger OC into your TV show and it started saying, "Hey, viewers! I'm Sabre-Toothed Sam!".
How did the characters on your show react?
1141.title: The original character breaks the 4th wall.

choices: A cartoon where characters like that wouldn't be out-of-place.
A cartoon that doesn't normally have characters like that.
A show with both cartoons and live action (like Who Framed Roger Rabbit?).
1142.content:
You introduced your character, a cartoon anthro sabre-toothed tiger, into your TV show.
You were watching...
1142.title: Other.

11421.content: As it turns out the cartoon show you're watching happened to be....
11421.title: A cartoon where characters like that wouldn'...

114211.content: So you were watching Tiny Toon Adventures, but which episode?
114211.title: Tiny Toon Adventures.

choices: A show made up for this story.
114212.title: Your Choice.

1142122.content:
Now then here's some made up animated shows for this story as one of these made up animated shows for this story happens to be a spoof parody or send up of 1995's Street Fighter the animated series and the other made up animated show for this story happens to be a made up spin off of 101 Dalmatian Street of course.

The Mega Stars: In this first made up animated show for this story, an international peacekeeping force composed of anthropomorphic animals who happen to be skilled martial artists and or face aligned professional wrestlers battle the evil general M. Cats and his criminal empire as they follow their code of honor involving the keywords discipline justice commitment truth and honor.

The Royal Corgis: In this other made up animated show for this story which happens to be a spin off of 101 Dalmatian Street, The Royal Corgis follows the royal corgi family of Buckingham Palace as the show's own stories happen to center right around their misadventures they tend to go on whilst they're either at home mainly Buckingham Palace or if they're traveling around the world as this show's full of family friendly British humor screwball slapstick comedy and 4th wall breaks as the show's characters also get to interact with the audience that's watching as well.
1142122.title: A show made up for this story.

114213.content: Which cartoon show is it?
114213.title: Your Choice.

1143.content: You sent your sabre-toothed tiger into a...
1143.title: Open Choice Chapter.

choices: Make you enter the TV world.
Make people from the TV world enter this world.
It's just a normal "enter" button on a remote.
It's similar to the "enter" key on a keyboard and allows you to skip.
12.content:
You decided to hit enter.
What does this button do?
12.title: Enter

choices: Put a random TV show on.
Make a bunch of random events happen onscreen.
Make a bunch of random events happen in the *real* world.
Change the episode of the show you're watching to a different, random one.
13.content:
You pressed the random button.
What does this button do?
13.title: Random

choices: Play an episode of a TV show about body swapping.
Make the characters swap bodies in the episode you're already watching.
141.content: What does Body Swap do?
141.title: Body Swap

choices: Make you swap with a character.
142.content: What does the Character Swap button do?
142.title: Character Swap

choices: Make you swap voices with a character.
143.content: What does the Voice Swap button do?
143.title: Voice Swap

info.brief_description: You get a NEW TV experience
info.description: You have been waiting for your cable to be hooked up when a guy shows up, after heâs done he hands you a remote and a booklet before leaving, you then notice that the remote is a lot different
